mapper.select: SELECT MN_NO mnNo, /*메뉴코드*/ MN_NAME mnName, /*메뉴명*/ MN_IDX mnIdx, /*메뉴순번*/ MN_PRNT_NO mnPrntNo /*상위메뉴코드*/ FROM MENU WHERE MN_DEL_YN='N'; /*메뉴삭제여부*/

SELECT MN_NO mnNo, /*메뉴코드*/ MN_NAME mnName, /*메뉴이름*/ MN_IDX mnIdx, /*메뉴순번*/ MN_URL mnUrl, /*메뉴url*/ MN_PRNT_NO mnPrntNo, /*상위메뉴코드*/ (SELECT MN_NAME mnPrntName FROM MENU WHERE MN_NO = (SELECT MN_PRNT_NO FROM MENU WHERE MN_NO=#{mnNo})) mnPrntName, MN_USE_YN mnUseYn, /*메뉴사용여부*/ MN_CRT mnCrt, /*메뉴생성날짜*/ MN_UPDT mnUpdt, /*메뉴업데이트날짜*/ MN_ATTR mnAttr /*메뉴속성*/ FROM MENU WHERE MN_NO=#{mnNo};
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET MN_IDX=#{mnIdx} WHERE MN_NO=#{mnNo}

UPDATE MENU SET MN_NAME=#{mnName}, /*메뉴명*/ MN_URL=#{mnUrl}, /*메뉴url*/ MN_USE_YN=#{mnUseYn}, /*메뉴사용여부*/ MN_ATTR=#{mnAttr}, /*메뉴속성*/ MN_UPDT=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%x%m%d%h%k%s") /*메뉴업데이트날짜*/ WHERE MN_NO=#{mnNo}
